name: Checkout
description:
Checkout is an arcade game where you play with geometric figures: cubes and etc. Grab a figure, search the special mark and tap. Collect stars also for resolving fun & tricky challenges. The clock is ticking, so you need to act fast. Exchange stars for new layouts! For example make your figures zebra or ice like! And many many more :)

FEATURES:
- Fun arcade game - In Checkout you grab a figure, search the special mark and tap. The clock is ticking, so you need to act fast.

- Geometry. Do you even remember? - Checkout is a game where you manipulate geometric figures: cubes, pyramids, pentagons, octahedrons etc. You look for marks. Resolve fun & tricky challenges and collect stars.

- Simple, innovative gameplay - Your aim is to collect stars. In exchange for them you get new layouts! For example make your figures zebra or ice like! And many many more.

- Beautiful and minimalistic design

- Free to play
